name: B.ring Y.our O.wn B.erliner
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "Berlin".

Bring  your  Own Berliner is a short Autorunner where you have to collect beer bottles and dodge police officers while you are on your way to a friends' party!

Game Description  

Key Features

-Ride your old Moped through the city and collect beer on the way! Can you find all 6 ?

-Dodge mean Police officers who just want to ruin the fun

-Discover 2 different endings, depending on how many bottles you can find!

Credits
  • Ditzie Doodle
  • Lots of Coding help from Stefan@DigitalPenguin
  • Music: Humble Music Bundle "Energetic Driving Rock Music Pack"
  • Graffity and Tag PNG's :cleanpng.com
  • Images of Berlin's "Eastside Gallery"-Graffity : wikimedia.org
  • Soundeffects : freesound.org
